alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 12 at 3:32PM PDT until April 14 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 1 PM PDT THURSDAY FOR ELEVATIONS ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches expected above 2500 feet during the morning and early afternoon hours. Snow levels will rise throughout the day. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 3500 feet during the evening and overnight. * WHERE...Northern Trinity, Southern Trinity, Northeastern Mendocino Interior and Northern Lake Counties. Including elevated portions and passes along Highways 3...36...and 299. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 1 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. Carry chains. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD. &&

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity
